statements: UPDATE website_personalization SET user_location = 'New York', last_visit = '2022-10-05 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_personalization SET conversion_status = True, pages_visited = pages_visited + 1 WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE website_personalization SET user_location = 'New York', last_visit = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', conversion_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_personalization SET user_email = 'example@gmail.com', pages_visited = pages_visited + 1 WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, country = 'USA', username = 'JohnDoe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET dark_mode = TRUE, language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, country = 'USA' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_preferences SET dark_mode = true, language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE users SET username='John Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET font_size=14, theme_color='dark' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password = 'newpassword' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET date_visited = '2022-01-20 10:30:00', page_visited = 'homepage' WHERE user_id = 2;

UPDATE users SET username = 'Alice', email = 'alice.smith@example.com' WHERE country = 'Canada';
UPDATE Users SET age = 30 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
